nodes.text: The Victory at Batonn was a starship that served the Galactic Empire during the government's rule. After scoring prime marks at Carida Academy and giving fine service aboard the Imperial starship Enigma, Tian Karmiya, who was eventually a commander in the Imperial Navy, served finely while aboard the Victory at Batonn, which further bolstered her reputation before she was stationed on the Imperial II-class Star Destroyer Ultimatum by 3 ABY. The Victory at Batonn shared its name with the planet Batonn, in which the Empire fought an insurgency and emerged victorious.
The Victory at Batonn was mentioned in the short story "The Final Order," written by Seth Dickinson as part of the 2020 short story collection From a Certain Point of View: The Empire Strikes Back.
